name: Secret Lake VR (PC-VR)
description:
Secret Lake VR is a simple interactive native VR experience.  We can enjoy the beautiful hyper-realistic  of underwater deep lake scenery in VR. I made this for Oculus PCVR (Rift-S) but also compatible with other PCVR HMD (Index, VIVE, Pimax, Reverb G2, etc.) via OpenXR, or Oculus Quest/Quest2 via Oculus Link/Air-Link.

Commands keys controller :
- Right-hand controller stick : teleport movement
- Left-hand controller stick : snap rotation
- Left-hand controller menu button : game menu (Restart game, Exit game)
- F11 keyboard button : toggle full-screen / windowed mode in preview screen (PC monitor)

** Minimal PC system requirement for PCVR:
- INTEL i7 2600K, NVIDIA GTX 1080, RAM 16GB

*** Minimal PC system requirement for Oculus Link/Air-Link:
- INTEL i5 10400F, NVIDIA RTX 2080, RAM 16GB, SSD/NVME storage.

Tips :
- To save your PC resource, you may toggle the preview in your PC Monitor screen to windowed mode (by pressing F11 keyboard button).

I hope you will enjoy it.
See you on another realistic VR/XR interactive experience in the future!

Happy gaming and cheers,

Chris
